original_text: Always remember to be kind to strangers. Let them stay in your homes. In this way, some people have received angels as visitors, and they did not know that they were angels.
korean_text: 손님 대접하기를 잊지 말라 이로써 부지중에 천사들을 대접한 이들이 있었느니라

sentences.original_text: Always remember to be kind to strangers
Let them stay in your homes
some people have received angels as visitors
and they did not know that they were angels
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들이 천사인 줄 알지 못했습니다
